replies.body:
I don't get why this has so many upvotes. Or what the joke is...

HELP, I HAVE SO MANY QUESTIONS.
Katarina's full name is "Katarina DuCouteau" and Couteau means knife in french. I changed her name for Bateau that means boat in french lol
Today I learned o___o
https://i.imgflip.com/1guku6.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/YbBrqw2.gif?noredirect
Hey now, it's not his fault.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HNHQFyXX,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-12-31T03:41:33.626+0000)
>
> Today I learned o___o

You said it wrong, "What I Learned In Boating School Is: BLANKITY BLANKITY BLANK!"
no he clearly said he learned oh underscore underscore underscore oh today, not BLANKITY BLANKITY BLANK!
Well, at least I know that I didn't get it not because I was stupid.
Give her boat paddles to wield as weapons, and you just might have a new skin design on your hands.
Notice me senpai
https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSpfd9nnzjwsuAnYV9WEj-I4vo0F4epruper12nqFbBGDEQ5Nd8
I thought the boat was going to be a Katamaran
Cringe

But it was the best kind of cringe, the kind of cringe one can only get from an extremely well thought out pun. Ah yes, I embrace the glorious cringe, and I hope someday you let the cringe into your heart as well, for the cringe shall be your one true savior. http://i.imgur.com/hrpXhSs.gif?noredirect
If I didn't know K-ON I would think she's having an orgasm.

I can see the possible misconception
http://i.imgur.com/Y9XJXSi.gif?noredirect
**Rule #1 of M&G boards concerning puns...**
I'm going to steal your meme now and send it to my French friends. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/284/922/0e3.png
Lol, I can confirm the joke

frontvote?

Front page?

What the hell is this, FunnyJunk?
you are using an ugly version of the katarina splash
Coloration of this boat gives me a headache.
